lead_paragraph: The effort to build the Thirty Meter Telescope has been held up by Hawaiians who say it desecrates Mauna Kea, one of their most beloved mountains.

headline.main: Under Hawaii’s Starriest Skies, a Fight Over Sacred Ground

snippet: The effort to build the Thirty Meter Telescope has been held up by Hawaiians who say it desecrates Mauna Kea, one of their most beloved mountains....
abstract: Battle over plan to install Thirty Meter Telescope on Mauna Kea in Hawaii has continued since protesters disrupted groundbreaking for project in 2014; some view fight as one between science and superstition, while others see plan to build telescope on sacred mountain as disrespectful to native Hawaiians; court hearings will take place in October.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Thirty Meter Telescope International Observatory LLC
